subtasks: Check on turkeys' shelter and water supply.
Move chicken water inside to prevent freezing.
Ensure chickens have access to heat source.
Prepare the brooder side of the barn.
Check on honeybees for winter readiness.

tasks.task: Provide insulation and warmth for chickens.
subtasks: Provide fresh straw for chickens to lay on.
Install heat lamps for chicken warmth.
Monitor chickens for signs of frostbite.
Assist a chicken (Barney) in accessing straw bed.
